It is an ecological park with high greenery coverage created by combining plant landscaping and hard landscaping in a "nature-based, above-nature" environment. Egret Park is located on the shore of Dushu Lake in the Gaoxiong District and is named after the egrets that often roost here.

Jinji Lake is a tributary of Taihu Lake, with more than 10 inlets and outlets. It receives water from Lou River in the north, Xiangmen Pond and Turnip Pond in the west, and the outlet water is mainly dipped into Wusong River through Xitang River, so it belongs to Wusong River water system. In Jinji Lake, there are musical fountain, water Ferris wheel, Li Gongdi, Peach Blossom Island, Jinji Lake Bridge Waterfall and other attractions.
It is the only comprehensive habitat simulation exhibit in Suzhou that integrates wildlife protection and breeding, science education, ecological tour and recreation.

It covers four thematic scenic spots, including Forest World, Forest Water World, Four Seasons Constant Temperature Water Park and Suzhou Paradise Botanical Garden, as well as multiple integrated businesses such as resort hotels, boutique lodging, specialty restaurants and thematic performances.

Tianping Mountain is a steep and dangerous mountain, known as Baiyun Mountain in ancient times, also known as Chi Mountain, which is the burial place of the ancestor of Fan Zhongyan, a famous minister in the Northern Song Dynasty. The scenic spot covers an area of nearly 100 hectares and is famous for its "red maples, strange rocks and clear springs", with 18 scenic spots such as Wan Wat Chao Tian and Gao Yi Jui Chui.

There are four basic displays in Suzhou Museum, namely, Wu Di Treasures, Wu Tower National Treasures, Wu Zhong Feng Yi, and Wu Men Calligraphy and Painting, with a total collection of 24,729 pieces/sets, 9,647 pieces/sets of precious cultural relics, including 222 pieces/sets of Grade I, 829 pieces/sets of Grade II, and 8,596 pieces/sets of Grade III.

Suzhou Center is the largest, best located and most comprehensive urban function carrier in Suzhou, with a variety of functions such as finance and business, commerce and culture, residence and leisure, etc. It has a variety of business formats such as office buildings, commerce, hotels, serviced apartments, culture and entertainment.

Huqiu Wetland Park is one of the "four corners of the landscape" identified in Suzhou\'s urban planning, an important "green wedge" in the "two belts, three rings and five wedges" green space system and an important "ecological green lung" in the northwest of Suzhou, and an important vehicle for accelerating the construction of ecological civilization in Suzhou.

Located in Suzhou Yangcheng Lake Peninsula Tourism Resort, Huayi Brothers Movie World has a total investment of 3.5 billion yuan and covers an area of about 400 acres, with 34 kinds of interactive entertainment programs, of which, 13 are indoor equipment and 21 are outdoor equipment. In addition, there are 11 performing arts shows, 7 movie-themed restaurants, 21 food and beverage outlets and more than 40 theme stores, integrating interaction, entertainment, fun, culture and technology.

Moon Bay is located in the "Suzhou Dushu Lake Science and Education Innovation Zone" of Suzhou Industrial Park (SIP), north of Moon Bay Square, south of Suzhou Dushu Lake Worldview Hotel and west of Qi Yue Street. The alleged water area is about 51,800 square meters, named after its full moon shape.

The completion and opening of Dushu Lake Church has provided a high-grade activity place for the majority of Chinese and foreign Christian believers in Suzhou, increasing the cultural connotation of the park and improving the living environment. At the same time, it provides the necessary facilities for the standardization of religious activities.

Longhu Shishan Tianjie is the largest one-stop all-storey shopping center in Suzhou, with 250 meters of main exhibition surface along the street, 360Â° perfect view of the sunken plaza, and the characteristic cross-storey sky-rise of Jiangnan.

Shantang Old Street is located on the bank of Shantang River, east of Jinji Lake in Suzhou Industrial Park, and is a commercial district featuring cultural tourism with strong memories of the waterfront homes and humanistic sentiments.
